CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Compared to homopolymer P6 , all copolymers P1-P5 exhibit red - shifted absorptions and smaller optical bandgaps in solution and in film.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| homopolymer P6 |
| copolymers P1 |
| copolymers P2 |
| copolymers P3 |
| copolymers P4 |
| copolymers P5 |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| homopolymer P6 |
| copolymers (P1, P2, P3, P4, P5) |

Explanation:
The original paragraph mentions "homopolymer P6" and "copolymers P1-P5". Since "copolymers" is a general term for a type of polymer, I have grouped all the copolymers under one entry with the label "copolymers (P1, P2, P3, P4, P5)" to maintain precision.
